high_descs: Walk to the large pot on the other side of the counter to the right.
Pick up the pot from the counter.
Put the pot in the sink basin.
anns.task_desc: Place a large pot in a sink.

high_descs: Walk forward, turn to the right, face the counter
Pick up the black pot from the table
Turn around and face the sink
Put the pot into the sink
anns.task_desc: Put the black pot into the sink

high_descs: walk straight, turn left to the side of the kitchen island
Grab the pot on the island
put the pot in the sink
anns.task_desc: move the pot from the kitchen island to the sink

high_descs: Go straight ahead and turn right to face the short side of the island.
Pick up the pot from the left side of the counter.
Carry the pot and turn around to the sink.
Place the pot inside the sink.
anns.task_desc: Move the pot from the island to the sink.
